content:
The provided chunk defines several menu item constants (e.g., ID_...: ("&...", None)) intended for use within a GUI application's menu system. These items represent specific actions or tools, such as parent-to-selected operations and curve-related functionalities like creating, editing, animating curves, and accessing graph editors. The context involves integrating these menu options into the existing ViewportMenu class to enhance user interaction capabilities in a graphical editor or similar application.

ID_PARENT_TO_SELECTED: ("&Parent To Selected", None),
            ID_CREATE_CURVE: ("&Create Curve", None),
            ID_EDIT_CURVE: ("&Edit Curve", None),
            ID_CURVE_ANIM: ("&Curve Animation", None),
            ID_ANIM: ("&Edit Animation", None),
            ID_GRAPH: ("&Graph Editor", None)
        })
